meanings.definition: Relating to or involving chemicals in the brain or nervous system.
meanings.sent1: The neurochemical changes in the brain can impact our mood.
meanings.sent2: Researchers study the neurochemical processes in the nervous system.
meanings.sent3: The neurochemical puzzle in the brain keeps scientists intrigued.
meanings.sent4: Her smile had a neurochemical effect on his mood.
meanings.sent5: The neurochemical reactions in the brain are like a symphony of molecules.

meanings.definition: A substance that acts as a neurotransmitter or affects the functioning of the nervous system.
meanings.sent1: The doctor prescribed a neurochemical to regulate neurotransmitter levels.
meanings.sent2: Neurochemicals play a crucial role in transmitting signals in the brain.
meanings.sent3: The neurochemical danced through the nervous system, spreading its message.
meanings.sent4: His words were like a neurochemical, triggering a cascade of reactions.
meanings.sent5: The neurochemical acted as a messenger, delivering important signals to the brain.
